title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Justin Fields, NBA playoffs, Joe Kelly, testing
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Justin Fields, NBA playoffs, Joe Kelly, testing
description:
Colin explains why he thinks OSU QB Justin Fields should leave, his thoughts on the NBA playoffs, why he feels Dodgers P Joe Kelly is right about the Astros and why we need to relax about some athletes testing positive for Covid-19.

Guest: Chris Broussard

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
